entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. High 26. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 21 April 2016
